description.en:
The content of the subject involves students' individual work under supervisor's guidance in obtaining necessary skills for writing their master's theses as well as preparing written papers related to the master's theses. 
During the course, students will report on their research results in academic presentations.
description.et:
Aine sisuks on üliõpilase individuaalne töö juhendajaga magistritööks vajalike oskuste omandamisel ning magistritööga seotud kirjalike tööde ettevalmistamisel.
Kursuse jooksul esitab üliõpilane oma uurimistulemused akadeemilises ettekandes.

objectives.en: In-depth developing of master students' skills at carrying out academic research work and writing.
objectives.et: Arendada süvendatult  magistrantide akadeemilise uurimistöö tegemise ja kirjutamise oskusi.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successful completing the subject, master students:
- will acquire skills of systematic cooperation with their supervisor;
- will draw up a research plan for a semester and be able to critically analyze its fulfillment;
learning_outcomes.et: - koostab uurimisplaani üheks semestriks ning suudab kriitiliselt analüüsida selle täitmist;

learning_outcomes.en: - will associate theoretical standpoints of their research topics with appropriate methods of analysis and the empirical material to be analyzed in their research work;
learning_outcomes.et: - seostab oma uurimisteemaga seotud teoreetilised seisukohad sobivate analüüsimeetoditega ning oma uurimistöös analüüsitava empiirilise materjaliga;

learning_outcomes.en: - will implement necessary methods for an analysis of the empirical material in academic writing, proceeding from the topic of their research work ;
learning_outcomes.et: - rakendab akadeemilist teksti kirjutades oma uurimistöö teemast lähtuvalt empiirilise materjali analüüsiks vajalikke meetodeid;

learning_outcomes.en: - will acknowledge basic principles of academic writing and be able to apply them in compiling master's theses;
learning_outcomes.et: - tunneb akadeemilise kirjutamise põhiprintsiipe ja oskab neid magistritöö koostamisel kasutada;

learning_outcomes.en: - will be able to express in a well-reasoned manner fundamental positions of their research topic in an academic presentation.
learning_outcomes.et: - suudab akadeemilises ettekandes argumenteeritult väljendada oma uurimisteema põhiseisukohti.
